item.title: [SWARM-256] Build fails on windows

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Hi,
The build still failing.

The next issue is :

-------------------------------------------------------
T E S T S
-------------------------------------------------------
Running org.wildfly.swarm.arquillian.ArquillianTest
Tests run: 1, Failures: 0, Errors: 1, Skipped: 0, Time elapsed: 2.392 sec <<< FAILURE! - in org.wildfly.swarm.arquillian.ArquillianTest
org.wildfly.swarm.arquillian.ArquillianTest Time elapsed: 2.392 sec <<< ERROR!
org.jboss.arquillian.container.spi.client.container.DeploymentException: C:\dev\jboss\wildfly-swarm\arquillian\test\C was not found in any available ClassLoaders
at org.wildfly.swarm.arquillian.adapter.WildFlySwarmContainer.deploy(WildFlySwarmContainer.java:85)
...

After an investigation noticed that this point is breaking:

https://github.com/wildfly-swarm/wildfly-swarm/blob/88add1372d951c4386cbe4d2b02e7272157f9403/arquillian/api/src/main/java/org/wildfly/swarm/arquillian/adapter/WildFlySwarmContainer.java#L75

Maybe is something on start method implementation of the class UberjarSimpleContainer
https://github.com/wildfly-swarm/wildfly-swarm/blob/7c7e72ecacbbc8c09f7936c18a0b0225b1bae9ea/arquillian/api/src/main/java/org/wildfly/swarm/arquillian/adapter/UberjarSimpleContainer.java#L66

I had failures when running 'hawkular', but that was because I was still on Maven 3.2.3 for some reason.

After upgrading to Maven 3.3.9 it got passed that and failed on 'integration-tests' but it appeared to be a timeout issue. On running it again it worked fine.

I'm closing for now, but Helio Frota feel free to reopen if you can't get the build working for you
